title: syscall: GOOS_GOOSVER_GOARCH z-files
body:
I've just realized that OpenBSD 5.1 changed its kernel API.
As far as I know, they re-arranged ifdata struct format and 
that breaks net.Interface and relatives API (fortunately no 
crash, just can't fetch kernel state).

Perhaps, GOOS_GOOSVER_GOARCH z-files make sense in 
the near future.
